00225 //===========================================================================
00247 void MSERNNet::model(const Array<double> &input){
00248   if(input.ndim()!=2){
00249     std::cerr << "STOP: MSERNNet::model requires a 2-dim input array\n";
00250     exit(1);
00251   }
00252   if(warmUpLength>0) Y=0.;
00253   processTimeSeries(input);
00254 }

00257 //===========================================================================
00277 void MSERNNet::model(const Array<double>& input,Array<double>& output){
00278   if(output.ndim()!=2){
00279     std::cerr << "STOP: MSERNNet::model requires a 2-dim output array\n";
00280     exit(1);
00281   }
00282   unsigned t,i,T=output.dim(0),M=output.dim(1);
00283   model(input);
00284   for(t=0;t<T;t++) 
00285     for(i=0;i<M;i++) 
00286       output(t,i)=Y(numberOfNeurons-1-i,T-1-t);
00287 }

00291 //===========================================================================
00322 double MSERNNet::error(const Array<double> &input,const Array<double> &target)
00323 {
00324   if(target.ndim()!=2){
00325     std::cerr << "STOP: MSERNNet::error requires a 2-dim target array\n";
00326     exit(1);
00327   }
00328 
00329   unsigned i,t,T,M;
00330   T=target.dim(0);
00331   M=target.dim(1);
00332 
00333   if(T <= warmUpLength) {
00334     std::cerr << "number of patterns not larger than warmup length\n";
00335     exit(1);
00336   }
00337 
00338   model(input);
00339   
00340   err.A=0;
00341   double totalError=0;
00342   double z;
00343   for(t=0;t<warmUpLength;t++)
00344     for(i=0;i<M;i++){
00345       err(numberOfNeurons-1-i,T-1-t)=0.0;
00346     }
00347   for(t=warmUpLength;t<T;t++)
00348     for(i=0;i<M;i++){
00349       z=err(numberOfNeurons-1-i,T-1-t)=Y(numberOfNeurons-1-i,T-1-t)-target(t,i);        
00350       totalError+=z*z;
00351     }
00352   totalError /= (T - warmUpLength) * M; 
00353   return totalError;
00354 }
00355 
00356 //===========================================================================
00396 double MSERNNet::errorPercentage(const Array<double> &input,const Array<double> &target)
00397 {
00398   unsigned t;
00399 #ifndef __SOLARIS_
00400   double outmax = std::numeric_limits< double >::min( );
00401   double outmin = std::numeric_limits< double >::max( );
00402 #else
00403   double outmax = -MAXDOUBLE;
00404   double outmin = MAXDOUBLE;
00405 #endif
00406 
00407   if(target.ndim() != 2){
00408           std::cerr << "STOP: MSERNNet::error requires a 2-dim target array\n";
00409     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00410   }
00411 
00412   unsigned T, M;
00413   T = target.dim(0);
00414   M = target.dim(1);
00415 
00416   if(T <= warmUpLength) {
00417           std::cerr << "number of patterns not larger than warmup length\n";
00418     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00419   }
00420 
00421   model(input);
00422   
00423   err.A      = 0;
00424   double totalError = 0;
00425   double z;
00426   for(t = 0; t < warmUpLength; t++)
00427     for(unsigned i = 0; i < M; i++){
00428       err(numberOfNeurons-1-i, T-1-t) = 0.0;
00429     }
00430   for(t=warmUpLength; t<T; t++)
00431     for(unsigned i=0; i<M; i++) {
00432       if(target(t, i) > outmax) outmax = target(t, i);
00433       if(target(t, i) < outmin) outmin = target(t, i);
00434       z = err(numberOfNeurons-1-i, T-1-t) = Y(numberOfNeurons-1-i, T-1-t) - target(t, i);       
00435       totalError += z * z;
00436     }
00437   totalError /= (T - warmUpLength) * M; 
00438   totalError *= 100 / ((outmax - outmin) * (outmax - outmin));
00439   return totalError;
00440 }

00462 double MSERNNet::meanSquaredError(const Array<double> &input,
00463                                   const Array<double> &target){

00468 //===========================================================================
00502 double MSERNNet::derror(const Array<double> &input,
00503                         const Array<double> &target, 
00504                         bool returnError){
00505   double e;
00506   e=error(input,target);
00507   calcGradBPTT();
00508   writeGradient();
00509   dedw /= (double) (target.dim(0) - warmUpLength) * target.dim(1);
00510   if (!returnError)
00511     e=-1;
00512   return e;
00513 }

00594 //===========================================================================
00615 void MSERNNet::initWeights(double low,double up){
00616   unsigned i,j,t;
00617   for(t=0;t<delay;t++) for(i=0;i<numberOfNeurons;i++) for(j=0;j<numberOfNeurons;j++){
00618     if(connectionMatrix(t,i,j)) weightMatrix(t,i,j)=Rng::uni(low,up);
00619     else weightMatrix(t,i,j)=0;
00620   }
00621   writeParameters();
00622 }

00626 //===========================================================================
00664 void MSERNNet::setStructure(Array<int> &mat){
00665   unsigned i,j,t;
00666   
00667   delay=mat.dim(0);
00668   numberOfNeurons=mat.dim(1);
00669   weightMatrix.resize(delay,numberOfNeurons,numberOfNeurons,false);
00670   dEw.resize(delay,numberOfNeurons,numberOfNeurons,false);
00671   stimulus.resize(numberOfNeurons,false);
00672   connectionMatrix.resize(delay,numberOfNeurons,numberOfNeurons,false);
00673   delMask.resize(delay,false);
00674   
00675   // ergaenzt 5.9. huesken
00676   // M.Toussaint: wieso denn das??? Y. wird erst in prepareTime initialisiert...
00677   Y.resize(numberOfNeurons,delay,false);
00678   Y.A = 0;
00679   delta.resize(numberOfNeurons,delay,false);
00680   delta.A = 0;
00681   
00682   connectionMatrix.A=mat;
00683   numberOfParameters=0;
00684   for(t=0;t<delay;t++){
00685     delMask(t)=0;
00686     for(i=0;i<numberOfNeurons;i++) for(j=0;j<numberOfNeurons;j++) if(connectionMatrix(t,i,j)){
00687       numberOfParameters++;
00688       delMask(t)=1;
00689     }
00690   }
00691   w.resize(numberOfParameters,false);
00692   dedw.resize(numberOfParameters,false);
00693 }

00763 //===========================================================================
00789 void MSERNNet::setStructure(std::string filename){
00790   // lade Netzdaten
00791   std::ifstream is;
00792   is.open(filename.c_str());
00793   unsigned nDelay;
00794   is >> nDelay;
00795   
00796   std::vector<int> l;
00797   const unsigned Len = 256;
00798   char buffer[Len];
00799   unsigned n = 0;
00800   is >> std::setw(Len) >> buffer;
00801 
00802   while(is) {
00803     n++;
00804     l.push_back(atoi(buffer));
00805     if(is.peek()=='\n') {
00806       break;
00807     }
00808 
00809     is >> std::setw(Len) >> buffer;
00810   }
00811   
00812   if(n == 0) {
00813         std::cerr << "no matrices given in net file";
00814     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00815   }
00816   
00817   Array<int> con (nDelay,n,n);    
00818   Array<double> wei (nDelay,n,n);
00819   unsigned i, j, k;
00820   
00821   for (i=0; i<con.dim(0); i++)
00822     for (j=0; j<con.dim(1); j++)
00823       if ((i==0) && (j==0)){
00824         for(k = 0; k < n; k++) con(i, j, k) = l[k];
00825       }
00826       else
00827         for (k=0; k<con.dim(2); k++){
00828           is >> con(i, j, k);
00829           if(!is) {
00830                 std::cerr << "not enough entries to build connection matrix" << std::endl;
00831             exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00832           }
00833         }
00834   
00835   for (i=0; i<wei.dim(0); i++)
00836     for (j=0; j<wei.dim(1); j++)
00837       for (k=0; k<wei.dim(2); k++){
00838         is >> wei(i, j, k);
00839         if(!is) {
00840           std::cerr << "not enough entries to build weight matrix" << std::endl;
00841           exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00842         }
00843       }
00844   
00845   setStructure(con,wei);
00846 }

00849 //===========================================================================
00877 void MSERNNet::write(std::string filename){
00878   unsigned i,j,k;
00879   FILE *fp=fopen(filename.c_str(),"wt");
00880   
00881   Array<int> con = getConnections();
00882   unsigned nDelay = con.dim(0);
00883   fprintf(fp,"%u\n",nDelay);
00884   
00885   for (k=0; k<nDelay; k++){  
00886     for (i=0; i<con.dim(1); i++){
00887       for (j=0; j<con.dim(2); j++){
00888         fprintf(fp,"%1d",con(k,i,j));
00889         if (j<con.dim(2)-1) fprintf(fp," ");
00890       }
00891       fprintf(fp,"\n");
00892     }
00893     fprintf(fp,"\n");
00894   }
00895   
00896   Array<double> wei = getWeights();
00897   for (k=0; k<nDelay; k++){  
00898     for (i=0; i<wei.dim(1); i++){
00899       for (j=0; j<wei.dim(2); j++){
00900         fprintf(fp,"%10.8e",wei(k,i,j));
00901         if (j<wei.dim(2)-1) fprintf(fp," ");
00902       }
00903       fprintf(fp,"\n");
00904     }
00905     fprintf(fp,"\n");
00906   }
00907   fclose(fp);
00908 }

00911 //===========================================================================
00945 void MSERNNet::setHistory(const Array<double> &Ystate)
00946 {
00947   if(Ystate.dim(0)!=numberOfNeurons || Ystate.dim(1)!=delay){
00948         std::cerr << "STOP: MSERNNet::setHistory: wrong dimensions\n";
00949     exit(1);
00950   }
00951   unsigned i,j;
00952   for(i=0;i<numberOfNeurons;i++) 
00953     for(j=0;j<delay;j++) 
00954       Y(i,j)=Ystate(i,j);
00955 }

00959 //===========================================================================
00978 Array<double> MSERNNet::getHistory(){
00979   unsigned i,j;
00980   Array<double> Ystate(numberOfNeurons,delay);
00981   for(i=0;i<numberOfNeurons;i++)
00982     for(j=0;j<delay;j++)
00983       Ystate(i,j)=Y(i,j);
00984   return Ystate;
00985 }

00993 
00994 
00995 // Activation function of all neurons.
00996 double MSERNNet::g(double a){ 
00997   return 1/(1+exp(-a));
00998 }
00999 
01000 
01001 // Computes the derivative of g(a) for all neurons.
01002 double MSERNNet::dg(double ga){
01003   return ga*(1-ga); 
01004 }
01005 
01006 
01007 // Initializes some internal variables.
01008 void MSERNNet::init0(){
01009   time=numberOfNeurons=delay=episode=numberOfParameters=0;
01010   warmUpLength=0;
01011   Y.resize(0,0,false);
01012   err.resize(0,0,false);
01013   delta.resize(0,0,false);
01014 }
01015 
01016 
01017 // Writes the values of the weights stored in the weight matrix to 
01018 // the parameter vector w of ModelInterface.
01019 void MSERNNet::writeParameters(){
01020   unsigned i,j,t,n=0;
01021   for(t=0;t<delay;t++) for(i=0;i<numberOfNeurons;i++) for(j=0;j<numberOfNeurons;j++)
01022     if(connectionMatrix(t,i,j)) w(n++)=weightMatrix(t,i,j);
01023 }
01024 
01025 
01026 // Reads the values of the parameter vector w of ModelInterface
01027 // and stores these values in the weight matrix.
01028 void MSERNNet::readParameters(){
01029   unsigned i,j,t,n=0;
01030   for(t=0;t<delay;t++) for(i=0;i<numberOfNeurons;i++) for(j=0;j<numberOfNeurons;j++)
01031     if(connectionMatrix(t,i,j)) weightMatrix(t,i,j)=w(n++); else weightMatrix(t,i,j)=0;
01032 }
01033 
01034 
01035 // Writes the values of the gradient of the error with respect to the
01036 // different weights from the variable dEw to the variable
01037 // dedw in the Model Interface. 
01038 void MSERNNet::writeGradient(){
01039   unsigned i,j,t,n=0;
01040   for(t=0;t<delay;t++) for(i=0;i<numberOfNeurons;i++) for(j=0;j<numberOfNeurons;j++)
01041     if(connectionMatrix(t,i,j)) dedw(n++)=dEw(t,i,j);
01042 }
01043 
01044 
01045 // Performs some initializations that are necessary to process the
01046 // time series.
01047 void MSERNNet::prepareTime(unsigned t){
01048   unsigned i,j;
01049   ArrayTable<double> Ystate,Dstate;
01050   Ystate.resize(numberOfNeurons,delay,false);
01051   Dstate.resize(numberOfNeurons,delay,false);
01052   for(i=0;i<numberOfNeurons;i++) for(j=0;j<delay;j++){
01053     Ystate(i,j)=Y(i,j);
01054     Dstate(i,j)=delta(i,j);
01055   }
01056   if(t!=episode){
01057     episode=t;
01058     Y.resize(numberOfNeurons,episode+delay,false);
01059     Y.A = 0;
01060     delta.resize(numberOfNeurons,episode+delay,false); 
01061     delta.A = 0;
01062     err.resize(numberOfNeurons,episode+delay,false);
01063     err.A = 0;
01064   }
01065   for(i=0;i<numberOfNeurons;i++) for(j=0;j<delay;j++){
01066     Y(i,t+j)=Ystate(i,j);
01067     delta(i,t+j)=Dstate(i,j);
01068   }
01069   time=t;
01070 }
01071 
01072 
01073 // Processes a whole time series. After processing the output can be 
01074 // found in the variable Y.
01075 void MSERNNet::processTimeSeries(const Array<double>& input){
01076   unsigned t,i;
01077   if(input.dim(1)>=numberOfNeurons){
01078         std::cerr << "STOP: structure has not enough neurons to handle input"
01079          << " - use setStructure(...)\n";
01080     exit(1);
01081   }
01082   
01083   readParameters();
01084   prepareTime(input.dim(0));
01085   stimulus.A=0;
01086   for(t=0;t<input.dim(0);t++){
01087     for(i=0;i<input.dim(1);i++) stimulus(i)=input(t,i);
01088     processTimeStep();
01089   }
01090 }
01091 
01092 
01093 // Processes one input pattern.
01094 void MSERNNet::processTimeStep(){
01095   unsigned i,j,t;
01096   double z;
01097   if(!time){ 
01098     fprintf(stderr,"MSERNNet::process: no time prepared!"); 
01099     exit(0); 
01100   }
01101   time--;
01102   for(i=0;i<numberOfNeurons;i++){
01103     z=stimulus(i);
01104     z+=weightMatrix(0,i,i);
01105     if(delMask(0)) 
01106       for(j=0;j<i;j++)
01107         z+=weightMatrix(0,i,j)*Y(j,time);
01108     for(t=1;t<delay;t++)
01109       if(delMask(t))
01110         for(j=0;j<numberOfNeurons;j++)
01111           z+=weightMatrix(t,i,j)*Y(j,time+t);
01112     Y(i,time)=g(z);
01113   }
01114 }
01115 
01116 
01117 // Performs backpropagation through time to calculate the derivative
01118 // of the error with respect to the weights. The results are stored to
01119 // dEw.
01120 void MSERNNet::calcGradBPTT(){
01121   int i,j,t,s,n;
01122   double z;
01123   
01124   for(t=0;t<(int)episode;t++) for(i=numberOfNeurons-1;i>=0;i--){
01125     z=err(i,t);
01126     if(delMask(0)) for(j=numberOfNeurons-1;j>i;j--)
01127       z+=delta(j,t)*weightMatrix(0,j,i);
01128     for(s=1;s<(int)delay && s<=t;s++) if(delMask(s)) for(j=numberOfNeurons-1;j>=0;j--)
01129       z+=delta(j,t-s)*weightMatrix(s,j,i);
01130     delta(i,t)=dg(Y(i,t)) * z;
01131   }
01132   
01133   for(t=0;t<(int)delay;t++) if(delMask(t)) for(i=0;i<(int)numberOfNeurons;i++){
01134     if (t>0) n=numberOfNeurons; else n=i;
01135     for(j=0;j<n;j++) if(connectionMatrix(t,i,j)){
01136       dEw(t,i,j)=0;
01137       for(s=0;s+t<(int)episode;s++) dEw(t,i,j)+=delta(i,s) * Y(j,t+s);
01138       dEw(t,i,j)*=2.0;
01139     }
01140   }
01141   
01142   for(i=0;i<(int)numberOfNeurons;i++) if(connectionMatrix(0,i,i)){
01143     dEw(0,i,i)=0;
01144     for(s=0;s<(int)episode;s++) dEw(0,i,i)+=delta(i,s);
01145     dEw(0,i,i)*=2.0;
01146   }
01147 }
